text: Lijndenia is a genus of plant in family Melastomataceae. The genus includes 13 species. Species include:http://www.theplantlist.org/browse/A/Melastomataceae/Lijndenia/ * Lijndenia barteri K. Bremer * Lijndenia bequaertii (De Wild.) Borhidi * Lijndenia brenanii (A. Fern. & R. Fern.) Jacq.-Fél. * Lijndenia capitellata K. Bremer * Lijndenia danguyana (H. Perrier) Jacq.-Fél. * Lijndenia fragrans (A. Fern. & R. Fern.) Borhidi * Lijndenia greenwayi (Brenan) Borhidi * Lijndenia jasminoides (Gilg) Borhidi * Lijndenia lutescens (Naudin) Jacq.-Fél. * Lijndenia melastomoides (Naudin) Jacq.-Fél. * Lijndenia procteri (A. Fern. & R. Fern.) Borhidi * Lijndenia roborea (Naudin) Jacq.-Fél. * Lijndenia semseii (A. Fern. & R. Fern.)
